mapper.select: select * from solo_contest where title like '%${title}%'
mapper.insert: insert into solo_contest(title, start_time, end_time, sign_start_time, sign_end_time, school_id, chief, phone, email, num_max) values (#{title}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{signStartTime}, #{signEndTime}, #{schoolId}, #{chief}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{numMax})
mapper.select: select isnull((select top(1) 1 from solo_contest_record where solo_contest_id=#{id}), 0)
mapper.insert: insert into solo_contest_record(solo_contest_id, student_id, is_starred) values (#{soloContestId}, #{studentId}, #{isStarred})
mapper.delete: delete from solo_contest_record where solo_contest_id = #{soloContestId} and student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: select S.school_name as schoolName, S.abbr_name as abbrName, ST.id as id, ST.stu_id as stuId, ST.stu_name as stuName, CONCAT(ST.family_name, ' ', ST.first_name) as stuForeignName, ST.phone, ST.email, ST.sex as sex, ST.size as size from school as S, student as ST, solo_contest as C, solo_contest_record as R where S.id = ST.school_id and ST.id = R.student_id and C.id = R.solo_contest_id and C.id = #{soloContestId} and S.id = #{schoolId}
